view.searchInput.name: Search Conditions
view.searchResults.name: Search Results
command.executeSearch.title: Execute Search
command.clearResults.title: Clear Results
command.expandAll.title: Expand All
command.collapseAll.title: Collapse All
command.executeRename.title: Rename Files
command.undoRename.title: Undo
command.redoRename.title: Redo
config.includeFolders.description: Folders to include in search (glob pattern, comma-separated)
config.excludeFolders.description: Folders to exclude from search (glob pattern, comma-separated)
config.replacementString.description: Replacement string for renaming (uses search pattern as regex)
config.logFileDirectory.description: Directory to save log files (empty uses VS Code extension log directory)
config.language.description: Display language (auto: follows VS Code language setting, en: English, ja: Japanese)
